agent

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • agent.Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAgent, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Agent
extends java.lang.Thread
implements IAgent, java.io.Serializable
    Represents a mobile agent capable of finding servers, migrating to them, and executing tasks.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getHomeSite

        public Node getHomeSite()
        Gets the home site of this Agent. The Agent returns to this home site when done with its tasks.
        Returns:
        this Agent's home.

      • setHomeSite

        public void setHomeSite(Node homeSite)
        Updates the home site of this Agent. The Agent returns to this home site when done with its tasks.
        Parameters:
        homeSite - the new home site

      • agentArrived

        public void agentArrived(AgentServer srv,
                         java.net.InetAddress srvInetAddr,
                         int serverPort)
        Runs this Agent's arrival sequence, consisting of adding the new server to its visited list, handshaking, executing its task, and returning home.
        Specified by:
        agentArrived in interface IAgent
        Parameters:
        srv - the server this Agent has arrived at
        srvInetAddr - the server's address
        serverPort - the server's port
